description:
The size of a credit card, the D3 sharpeners fit in your pocket for touching up edges wherever you are.

  • Monocrystalline diamond surface sharpens knives faster than conventional stones
  • Includes coarse diamond: (45 micron / 325 mesh) to quickly restore an edge, fine (25 micron / 600 mesh) for a razor sharp edge, and extra-fine (9 micron / 1200 mesh) to polish and refine the edge
  • Each sharpener is 8 x 5 x 1cm and includes a vinyl case
  • No oil is needed, simply sharpen dry or with water
name: DMT D3 Set Sharpeners
